casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. LEO NEWMAN’S THEATRE TICKET OFFICE, Inc., Philip Guryan, and Samuel Bloom, Appellants. No. 272. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 27, 1939. Stanley Fowler, of Riverhead, L. I., N. Y. (Stanley Fowler, of Riverhead, L. I., N. Y., and Ralph O. L. Fay, of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. Gregory F. Noonan, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Jesse' Moss, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before AUGUSTUS N. HAND and CHASE, Circuit Judges, and PATTERSON, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
